name: Fix It Dude
description:
"FIX IT DUDE"

DESCRIPTION: This is a top-down view game and your job is to destroy all of the buildings before times run out or getting caught by polices

TEAM MEMBERS: Daniel Truong.

HOW TO PLAY: HOLD down arrow keys and SPACE to destroy the building, don't get caught and beware of the time limit for each levels.

HOW TO OPEN GAME: Click this link https://Fix-it-Dude.anhduy1202.repl.co to play it in the browser

LANGUAGE/LIB: Kaboom.js (JavaScript/Node.js)

CREDITS: https://elements.envato.com (Free music/SFX), Daniel Truong (code/assets)
